short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Preform the 'User is Drunk' test on a given site

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Drunks have blurry vision. Give users one important thing to concentrate on, whether itâ€™s signing up for your service or buying a kebab. You should still be able to understand the main actions and areas.
